summary: A utility script that loads a pretrained Stable Diffusion model, incorporates Low‑Rank Adaptation (LoRA) weights into the model’s parameters using NVIDIA NeMo tools, optionally updates the model configuration, and writes out a single combined checkpoint ready for inference or deployment.
business_intent: Enable users to consolidate LoRA fine‑tuned adaptations with the original diffusion model into one deployable artifact, simplifying model serving, reducing runtime complexity, and supporting production‑grade inference pipelines.
